title: Interruption
description: Play when another character declares an Action: cancel or force change.

title: Motivation
description: Everyone in your room draws 1 card.

title: Basic Repairs
description: Remove Malfunction marker from current room.

title: Rest
description: Heal 1 Light Wound OR scan a Contamination card and remove if infected.

title: Order
description: Move another character to adjacent room (with/without consent).

title: Demolition
description: Destroy 1 Door or destroy Technical Corridor in your room.

title: Search
description: Draw 2 cards from the Item deck of this room’s color.

title: Suppressive Fire
description: Escape yourself or another without Intruder attack (discard 1 Ammo).

title: Search
description: Draw 2 cards from the Item deck of this room’s color.
